Race.SpecificTitle: City of DeRidder -- 2.6 Mill - City Council - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
CITY OF DERIDDER PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 2.6 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING AND IMPROVING POLICE AND FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT FOR THE CITY, INCLUDING THE ACQUISITION OF VEHICLES, FIRE TRUCKS AND COMMUNICATIONS EQUIPMENT.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of DeRidder, State of Louisiana, levy a special tax of two and six tenths (2.6) mills on all the property subject to taxation in said City, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2006 and ending with the year 2015, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing and improving police and fire protection facilities and equipment for the City, including the acquisition of vehicles, fire trucks and communications equipment?
